main.name: Richie Kid Novell
main.occupation: Data Scientist / Data Engineer / Data Analyst
main.description: Data Professional adept at creating and migrating databases for web apps. In a key project, I built a database from scratch, chose the data types and framework, merged tables, and moved it to the cloud. I also compiled and cleaned the data, conducted EDA, and created a dashboard from scratch, enhancing stakeholder understanding. Passionate about web scraping side projects to explore interests like self developmement, entrepreneurship, and health
main.bio: Hi! I'm a Data Professional experienced in creating and migrating databases for web apps. I began my journey as a junior data engineer in the agriculture industry, which evolved into roles as a data analyst and data scientist. Currently, I freelance as a data engineer, helping companies establish their data architecture. My dream is to become an expert data scientist and uncover tons of valuable insights. That's why I'm actively seeking a junior data science position at a reputable company to further my journey towards this goal! Passionate about self-development, entrepreneurship, and health, I thrive on turning data into valuable insights. Let's collaborate and embark on an exciting data-driven journey together!
main.contactmessage: Contact me to discuss how I can help you leverage the power of data science and analysis to drive insights and growth for your business!

quotes1.title: Empowering Better Decision-Making with the Power of Data and Statistics
quotes1.description: Unlocking success through data-driven decisions. With expertise in data analysis and statistical techniques, I empower better decision-making by revealing valuable insights. Let's collaborate on your projects, leveraging the power of data and statistics to drive impactful outcomes. Together, we'll harness the wealth of information available to make informed choices and achieve your goals. Reach out to explore the possibilities of data-driven success and maximize your potential.

quotes2.title: In a world overflowing with data it's time to uncover insights to drive innovation and informed decisions.
quotes2.description: As a data scientist, I possess the expertise to analyze complex datasets, apply advanced techniques, and build predictive models. With a passion for problem-solving and a curious mindset, I extract valuable insights from data to enable informed decision-making and fuel innovation. I am dedicated to leveraging the power of data to drive success and create positive impact.

work.title: Data Engineer Freelance
work.description: Preparing data for Machine Learning Model.

resume.skillssectiontitle: Passionate about Making a Data-Driven Impact
resume.skillssectiondescription: Driven by a deep passion for data science, I strive to make a meaningful impact. With a strong foundation in statistical analysis, machine learning, and data visualization, I am dedicated to uncovering insights and driving informed decisions. Skilled in Python, Excel, Tableau, Spark, SQL and Django & Vue, I am adept at handling and analyzing complex datasets. Let's collaborate to unlock the power of data and create actionable solutions that drive success.

projects.title: Udemy Course Enrollment Dashboard
projects.description: A dynamic dashboard was created by integrating Google Search data and a Kaggle dataset to extract valuable information regarding course attendance and content demand on the Udemy course hosting platform.

projects.title: Company X Loan Risk Prediction
projects.description: In collaboration with a fintech partner, we developed a Python-based loan risk predictive model. Analyzing a large dataset, we built a precise linear regression model with a 72% accuracy rate, adopted for effective risk management.

projects.title: Churn Prediction in Massive Open Online Course Enrollment
projects.description: Employing multivariable logistic regression, I crafted four models to assess the likelihood of churn among MOOC students, a group known for their historically documented limited dedication to educational offerings.

testimonials.text: Richie is an exceptional team player and dedicated data scientist who consistently seeks solutions, embraces challenges, and adapts his work based on feedback, making him an invaluable asset as a data science intern; his unwavering commitment, strong skill set, and passion for excellence will undoubtedly contribute to his success in any team.

Having worked with him at The Kambyan Network and Mashag Technology, I've witnessed his exceptional growth and dedication. As a self-taught Data Engineer, he's quick learning, hard work, and positive attitude have made him an invaluable asset. With his strong skill set, adaptability, and unwavering passion for excellence, He is destined for success in any full-time role he pursues.

services.title: Data Scientist
services.description: Apply statistical and machine learning techniques to analyze and interpret complex datasets, Develop predictive models and algorithms to solve business problems, and Extract insights and patterns from data to drive informed decision-making

services.title: Data Analyst
services.description: Collect, clean, and preprocess data for analysis, Perform exploratory data analysis to uncover patterns and trends,Create reports, visualizations, and dashboards to present data insights

services.title: Data Engineer
services.description: Develop and maintain data pipelines and infrastructure, Design and optimize databases for storage and retrieval of large-scale datasets, and Implement data processing frameworks and tools

awwards.title: Google - Data Analytic Profesional Certificate
awwards.description: The Google Data Analytics Professional Certificate taught me essential skills in data collection, cleaning, analysis, and visualization. With hands-on experience using tools like SQL and Tableau, I am now prepared to pursue a career in data analysis, applying statistical concepts and making data-driven decisions.

awwards.title: CADS - Advance Python for Analaytic
awwards.description: The  program provided me with advanced Python skills for data analysis. I learned techniques for data manipulation, statistical analysis, machine learning, and data visualization. Through hands-on projects, I gained practical experience in applying these skills to real-world datasets. This program has equipped me to tackle complex data analysis tasks and derive meaningful insights using Python.
